hero.title: Scintirete
hero.subtitle: Illuminate the data web, discover infinite neighbors
hero.description: Simple, lightweight, production-ready high-performance vector database designed for small to medium projects and edge computing scenarios

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Vector database designed for modern applications, combining high performance with ease of use

simple.title: Simple & Lightweight
simple.description: Core logic implemented independently, no redundant dependencies, focusing on the essential functions of vector search

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Based on in-memory HNSW graph index, providing millisecond-level nearest neighbor search

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Implemented Redis-like AOF + RDB efficient persistence mechanism based on flatbuffers

interface.title: Modern Interface
interface.description: Native support for both gRPC and HTTP/JSON dual interfaces, easy to integrate into any modern application architecture

operations.title: Easy Operations
operations.description: Provides structured logging, audit logs, Prometheus metrics and convenient command-line tools

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform
cross_platform.description: Supports Linux, macOS, Windows and arm64, amd64 architectures out of the box

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.subtitle: Get Scintirete vector database up and running in minutes

download_guide.title: Installation & Deployment
download_guide.subtitle: Scintirete supports both binary deployment and Docker container deployment
download_guide.after_startup: After startup, you can manage the database through:
download_guide.ui_description: Intuitive visual interface supporting database creation, collection management, vector operations, and more

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join our open source community and experience the power of next-generation vector database

demos.title: Demo Center
demos.subtitle: Experience the powerful capabilities of Scintirete vector database through hands-on interaction and explore various real-world application scenarios

ai_gallery.title: AI Gallery Search
ai_gallery.description: Deep learning-based image similarity search demo. Upload your images and experience millisecond-level semantic search to discover visually similar content.
ai_gallery.preview_subtitle: Drag & Drop • Real-time Search • Similar Recommendations
ai_gallery.page_description: Upload images or choose examples to experience millisecond-level image similarity search powered by Scintirete vector database
ai_gallery.search_placeholder: Describe the image you're looking for, or drag & drop/paste images here...
ai_gallery.upload_hint: Support drag & drop, paste images, or click the button on the right to select files
ai_gallery.search_timing: Total time {total}ms (Image processing {processing}ms, Vectorization {vectorization}ms, Database search {database}ms)
ai_gallery.no_more_results: All results with similarity > 30% have been displayed
ai_gallery.error_file_too_large: File {filename} is too large({size}KB), please select images smaller than {max}KB

features.upload_desc: Support drag & drop and paste upload with automatic image feature extraction
features.vector_search_desc: Millisecond-level similar image retrieval based on HNSW algorithm
features.realtime_desc: Smooth user experience with instant search results display
